configuration:
javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL jdbc:mysql://hadoop2:2206/hivestore
javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName hive
javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword hiveMeta@987
hive.metastore.warehouse.dir /user/hive/warehouse
hive.metastore.schema.verification true
hive.vectorized.execution.enabled true
hive.warehouse.subdir.inherit.perms false
hive.auto.convert.join true
hive.metastore.port 2299
hive.metastore.uris thrift://hadoop2:2299
hive.metastore.event.db.notification.api.auth false
hive.metastore.authorization.storage.checks true
hive.server2.thrift.min.worker.threads 10
hive.server2.thrift.max.worker.threads 2048
hive.server2.thrift.port 2245
hive.server2.thrift.http.port 2244
hive.server2.webui.port 2246
hive.server2.authentication NONE
hive.server2.zookeeper.namespace /hive/server2
hive.execution.engine mr
hive.server2.logging.operation.log.location /home/hadoop/hive/log-operation
hive.server2.enable.doAs false
#配置优化
hive.fetch.task.conversion.threshold 268435456
hive.limit.pushdown.memory.usage 0.1
hive.merge.smallfiles.avgsize 16777216
hive.merge.size.per.task 268435456
hive.optimize.reducededuplication true
spark.shuffle.service.enabled true
hive.auto.convert.join true
hive.exec.parallel true
hive.server2.service.users hadoop,hive,deploy,spark,root Comma separated list of users to have HiveServer2 skip authorization when compiling queries.
hive.distcp.privileged.doAs hadoop
This property allows privileged distcp executions done by hive to run as this user.
hive.users.in.admin.role hadoop,hive,deploy,spark
hive.server2.trusted.domain hadoop0,hadoop1,hadoop2,hadoop3,hadoop4
hive.default.file.encoding UTF-8
iceberg.engine.hive.enabled true
iceberg.catalog.another_hive.type hive
iceberg.catalog.another_hive.uri thrift://hadoop2:2299
iceberg.catalog.another_hive.clients 1000
iceberg.catalog.another_hive.warehouse /user/hive/warehouse
